Text: PMA log for DecemberPlease make all adjustments that are needed for the Prepay books in the January DPR These variances are causing a problem for Faith Killens flash to actual process and Arthur Anderson has been questioning the variance from the total value in Schedule B versus the controls group schedule AA loves to dissect the prepay books Please let me know if any of you have any questions Thanks

PVR IncomeBelow is the PVR schedule that is passed on to me by gas accounting The dollar amount of needs to be passed through the NG Price book as a liquidation and an offsetting origination for Charlie Otto In the past Dutch used to handle this process so I am sure that he could answer any questions that you may have The line items that are highlighted in blue total the that needs to be passed through the DPR The other line items in the schedule have already been taken Thanks Forwarded by Shannon McPearsonHOUECT on AM From Connie NRON on PM To Shannon CT cc Subject PVR Income Hi Sharon Here is the schedule for Charles Ottos origination The amount is and I booked it at account Let me know what other information do you need Thanks Conniex

January NGPL fixCould you please make the following adjustments in your NG Price DPRs in order to correct the NGPL January problem In the NG DPR reduce the liquidations in Roll by This should bring your total hedge management number on your report page to which will make the DPR tie to the NGPL for January Then in your February DPR take an income adjustment of You can add this adjustment to the PMA file that I sent you last week If you make these two adjustments it should get us back to where we need to be for the NGPL tie out Let me know if you have any questions Thanks Shannon

PMAsyou will find the outstanding PMAs as of March accounting You will see adjustments requested by financial settlements They have finally provided us with reconciliations for the contract periods of Dec through Feb Financial settlements thought that reconciling current month s and working backwards would be best So you should continue to see PMAs from financial settlements for previous months as they become available to us Please let me know if you have any questions Thanks Shannon McPearson Enron North America
PMA Log Cc if you have any questions Thanks Shannon
NG Gas Deferredneed a DPR for the NG Gas Deferred book for April Thanks Shannon McPearson Enron North America

NG Deferred PST Errol I have saved a DPR in the regions path for the NG Gas Deferred for Please save the file NGDKRSgood as your file for the NGDKRS I had to change your beginning balances for to tie to your ending balances for and I changed your gross book balance so that it ties to the value in Schedule C These changes however did not change your PL for the month Thanks Shannon McPearson Enron North America

RE PG BookPST This is taking more research than we thought I am getting some post IDs unarchived and pulling max exposure detail out of archives So we may not have a resolution until next close I will let you know Original Message From McLaughlin Jr Errol Sent Tuesday October AM To McPearson Shannon Subject RE PG Book This looks like the macro problem we talked about Let me know what I need to do to fix Thanks Errol X Original Message From McPearson Shannon Sent Tuesday October PM To McLaughlin Jr Errol Subject PG Book Errol Is a Macro problem your final answer on this I need an answer on this If the beginning balances were changed in error please let me know this so I can determine what I need to do to fix this variance Again this change did not affect your PL In the January PG book DPR for the EOL Gas Daily Roll you reduced your beginning Gross Balance for January by and you increased your beginning Liquidated Balance for January by So the EOL Gas Daily Roll stayed flat in total and did not cause a problem PL wise However this amount is falling out on my reconciliation for January Could you please tell me what deal or deals were liquidated for which in turn caused a reduction in your MTM We are concerned that these may be third party deals that Financial Settlements are not aware of Thanks Shannon McPearson Enron North America

RE PG BookThis is taking more research than we thought I am getting some post IDs unarchived and pulling max exposure detail out of archives So we may not have a resolution until next close I will let you know Original Message From McLaughlin Jr Errol Sent Tuesday October AM To McPearson Shannon Subject RE PG Book This looks like the macro problem we talked about Let me know what I need to do to fix Thanks Errol X Original Message From McPearson Shannon Sent Tuesday October PM To McLaughlin Jr Errol Subject PG Book Errol Is a Macro problem your final answer on this I need an answer on this If the beginning balances were changed in error please let me know this so I can determine what I need to do to fix this variance Again this change did not affect your PL In the January PG book DPR for the EOL Gas Daily Roll you reduced your beginning Gross Balance for January by and you increased your beginning Liquidated Balance for January by So the EOL Gas Daily Roll stayed flat in total and did not cause a problem PL wise However this amount is falling out on my reconciliation for January Could you please tell me what deal or deals were liquidated for which in turn caused a reduction in your MTM We are concerned that these may be third party deals that Financial Settlements are not aware of Thanks Shannon McPearson Enron North America

RE NG CanPST Attached is what I ran out of TAGG settlements for book W Original Message From McLaughlin Jr Errol Sent Wednesday January PM To McPearson Shannon Subject RE NG Can What is the post id youre looking at Mine from Monday shows value Original Message From McPearson Shannon Sent Wednesday January PM To McLaughlin Jr Errol Subject NG Can I am pulling a liquidated value for the NG Canadian book I am showing expense of The counterparty names for these deals are FT Canada The DPR currently shows a zero liquidated value Shannon McPearson Enron North America

NG CanPST I am pulling a liquidated value for the NG Canadian book I am showing expense of The counterparty names for these deals are FT Canada The DPR currently shows a zero liquidated value Shannon McPearson Enron North America
PMA LogPST Shannon McPearson Enron North America

NG X OPT PMAsPST Errol Could you move the PMA adj for Power to the power roll Tracy needs to see this in the power roll so that she can net it against her outstanding variances Thanks Shannon McPearson Enron North America
NG PR CrudePST Have you liquidated the NG PR Crude roll I am pulling income from TAGG The DPR shows zero value Shannon McPearson Enron North America
Post IDsPST Please NG Price NG PR OPT NG X OPT NG NG X OPT HO NG X OPT GAS Daily NG X OPT Index NG X OPT HU NG X OPT WTI NG X OPT JV Thanks Shannon McPearson Enron North America

PG BookErrol Is a Macro problem your final answer on this I need an answer on this If the beginning balances were changed in error please let me know this so I can determine what I need to do to fix this variance Again this change did not affect your PL In the January PG book DPR for the EOL Gas Daily Roll you reduced your beginning Gross Balance for January by and you increased your beginning Liquidated Balance for January by So the EOL Gas Daily Roll stayed flat in total and did not cause a problem PL wise However this amount is falling out on my reconciliation for January Could you please tell me what deal or deals were liquidated for which in turn caused a reduction in your MTM We are concerned that these may be third party deals that Financial Settlements are not aware of Thanks Shannon McPearson Enron North America
PMAsPST Shannon McPearson Enron North America
NG DeferredPST Please save the revised file attached for the NG Gas Deferred book DPR The changes did not affect PL The changes are highlighted in yellow on Roll Shannon McPearson Enron North America

NG Gas Deferred DPRPST We have attached a revised DPR for the June NG Gas Deferred DPR Could you make the changes on roll that are highlighted in purple and save it as the new June DPR Your PL number has not changed Please use this DPR to copy over for your July DPR Thanks Shannon McPearson Enron North America
PMA Log PST Shannon McPearson Enron North America mailto

Risk PMAsPST Attached is the PMA log as of April accounting Errol let me know if you would be interested in setting up a meeting with financial settlements concerning the PG book Thanks Shannon McPearson Enron North America mailto
